doc.after: Anarchism is a philosophy that embodies many diverse attitudes tendencies and schools of thought as such disagreement over questions of values ideology and tactics is common The compatibility of capitalism 269 nationalism and religion with anarchism is widely disputed Similarly anarchism enjoys complex relationships with ideologies such as Marxism communism and capitalism Anarchists may be motivated by humanism divine authority enlightened self interest veganism or any number of alternative ethical doctrines
